Swift payment system they duplicated the

petrol ruble they've been hoarding a lot

that these economies have in common is
that they are all major players in the

the people Bank of China referred to
what was actually signed in September of
this year
the deputy governors of the two central
banks jointly chaired an inter country

now of course the Chinese might come out

large quantities of synthetic
derivatives on gold which are completely

what these countries want to do is they
want a price gold on the physical market
now of course central banking the
central banks isn't they don't like this
especially when the system is being
